data.name: GodGirl：HD&Dynamic Wallpaper
data.detailed_description:
GodGirl's HD Wallpaper and dynamic wallpaper

Including 12 Gods in the normal state of HD static wallpaper and dynamic wallpaper,

No matter where you are, you can enjoy this beautiful picture of mythology

After downloading DLC, the game installation directory will appear "God_Wallpapers" contain the wallpapers

Like D:\Program Files\SteamLibrary\steamapps\common\GodGirl\God_Wallpapers

Static HD wallpaper specification: 4K / 1080 16:9（JPG）

Dynamic wallpaper specification: 4K cycle MP4 video,

simple import any dynamic wallpaper engine like“Wallper Engine”can be used
(for example, wallpaper engine: create a new wallpaper, and then select MP4 video.)

data.short_description: GodGirl's HD Wallpaper and dynamic wallpaper,No matter where you are, you can enjoy this beautiful picture of mythology
data.supported_languages:
Japanese*, Simplified Chinese, Traditional Chinese, English
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: windows 7/8/10
  • Processor: i3
  • Memory: 4096 MB RAM
  • Storage: 8192 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: 解像度最低(min)1280*720、おすすめ(standard)1920*1080、きわめてよい(very good)
